summary: This is a Federal Bureau of Prisons TRUINTEL Supervisor Rounds log for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, covering rounds on August 9-10, 2019. It documents routine security checks, including PREA (Prison Rape Elimination Act) rounds, in various housing units, including the Special Housing Unit (SHU) and a 'SUICIDE RM'.

events.title: Supervisor Rounds at MCC New York
events.description: Multiple rounds of security checks conducted by lieutenants in various housing units (9 SOUTH SHU, 10 SOUTH UPPER, etc.) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

events.title: Supervisor Rounds at MCC New York
events.description: Continued rounds of security checks by lieutenants, including checks in a 'SUICIDE RM' (suicide room) and standard housing units.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York (MCC New York)
keyFacts: The log covers prison supervisor rounds on August 9 and 10, 2019, just before Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
Rounds were conducted in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) and a designated 'SUICIDE RM', indicating heightened monitoring areas.
All rounds were marked as 'PREA Round Level 3', signifying compliance with the Prison Rape Elimination Act.
The document is a routine administrative log showing standard prison security procedures were being documented.
The log was generated on August 11, 2019, the day after Epstein's death.
